thread.title: Customer X

author: Customer X
title: Customer X
text: Gamersgate has a decent catalogue to choose from and reasonable pricing on sale items however the one glaring omission from their business practice is the lack of a refund policy. Many other merchants offer refunds but they do not hands down. Once you click purchase no matter what happens too bad it's your problem now. Even if the purchase has serious issues with the product. They still get their money and you don't get yours back. Shop other merchants if you can you'll be much better off.
